title: Personal Portfolio
description: My personal portfolio website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features a responsive design, dark mode toggle, and interactive project gallery.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A responsive weather application that shows current conditions and 5-day forecast using the OpenWeather API. Includes geolocation and search functionality.

title: Task Tracker
description: A React-based task management application with local storage persistence. Features include task creation, deletion, reminders, and category filtering.

title: E-commerce Store
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). Features product browsing, cart functionality, user authentication, and payment processing with Stripe.

title: Movie Database App
description: A movie browsing application that uses the TMDB API. Users can search for movies, view details, save favorites, and create watchlists. Built with React and styled-components.
